### lowerCall() {#af3fdfad8a2951ca4c86fd64560c550a7}

### lowerFormalArguments() {#a7f23ab7ec21b86b46d5a5e34ac33ba7d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool ARMCallLowering::lowerFormalArguments (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder">MachineIRBuilder</a> &amp; MIRBuilder, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp; F, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> &gt; &gt; VRegs, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionloweringinfo">FunctionLoweringInfo</a> &amp; FLI) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
This hook must be implemented to lower the incoming (formal) arguments, described by <code>VRegs</code>, for GlobalISel.

Each argument must end up in the related virtual registers described by <code>VRegs</code>. In other words, the first argument should end up in <code>VRegs</code>&#91;0&#93;, the second in <code>VRegs</code>&#91;1&#93;, and so on. For each argument, there will be one register for each non-aggregate type, as returned by <code>computeValueLLTs</code>. <code>MIRBuilder</code> is set to the proper insertion for the argument lowering. <code>FLI</code> is required for sret demotion.


<SectionUser title="Returns">
True if the lowering succeeded, false otherwise.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armcalllowering-h/#l00038">38</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armcalllowering-h">ARMCallLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armcalllowering-cpp/#l00372">372</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armcalllowering-cpp">ARMCallLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### lowerReturn() {#a49a30e74a8632576007b3678649c9fb9}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool ARMCallLowering::lowerReturn (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder">MachineIRBuilder</a> &amp; MIRBuilder, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; Val, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> &gt; VRegs, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionloweringinfo">FunctionLoweringInfo</a> &amp; FLI) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
This hook behaves as the extended lowerReturn function, but for targets that do not support swifterror value promotion.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armcalllowering-h/#l00034">34</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armcalllowering-h">ARMCallLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armcalllowering-cpp/#l00221">221</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armcalllowering-cpp">ARMCallLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

### lowerReturnVal() {#ae5d1266fd746b5c51b6995eb91f9eeab}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool ARMCallLowering::lowerReturnVal (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder">MachineIRBuilder</a> &amp; MIRBuilder, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; Val, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> &gt; VRegs, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder">MachineInstrBuilder</a> &amp; Ret) const</>}>
Lower the return value for the already existing <code>Ret</code>.

This assumes that <code>MIRBuilder&#39;s</code> insertion point is correct.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armcalllowering-h/#l00048">48</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armcalllowering-h">ARMCallLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armcalllowering-cpp/#l00190">190</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armcalllowering-cpp">ARMCallLowering.cpp</a>.
